description: This source file defines the `Responsive` class providing static methods for adaptive UI layout calculations based on screen size. It relies on `ResponsiveBreakpoints` for breakpoint-specific values and offers methods for padding, grid columns, card widths, icon sizes, font scaling, and grid delegate configuration.

classes.name: Responsive
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for responsive UI calculations based on screen size.

methods.name: screenPadding
methods.description: Returns padding for screens, varying by size category.

methods.name: gridColumns
methods.description: Determines the number of grid columns based on screen size, with optional overrides.

methods.name: cardMaxWidth
methods.description: Provides maximum width constraints for cards based on screen size.

methods.name: headerIconSize
methods.description: Returns icon size suitable for headers, adapting to device size.

methods.name: titleFontScale
methods.description: Provides a scaling factor for titles based on screen size.

methods.name: gridDelegateForCards
methods.description: Returns a grid delegate for card layouts, with responsive column count and spacing.
